website_summaries.verdict: Baby gets two products for the price of one: a soothing swing with gliding motion, and a portable bouncer seat. The innovative frame design takes up much less room than many other swings, so this is a great choice for a small nursery. Runs on AC power or batteries.
pros: The back-and-forth gliding motion is very calming, and there are six speed settings, along with two levels of vibration
Includes 15 songs and sounds plus toys to interest babies
The carry handle makes it a snap to lift the seat out of the frame, making it into a bouncy seat
cons: While the cradle/seat lifts out easily for use as a bouncy seat, the frame is not really designed for portability
Some users complained that the sound quality of the music was poor

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: I found the swing to be very high quality and our baby loves it. I hoped that we would get more use out of the bassinet though. I planned to use the bassinet in our bedroom for the first few months before transitioning to her crib. During her first two weeks, our baby rolled to her side while sleeping. The bassinet sides are mesh, but a considerable portion of the head and foot area is solid material. I worried that she would suffocate if she rolled to her side and therefore could not continue to use the bassinet. I wish the mesh portion of the bassinet sides continued around the entire wall.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Baby and parents love this for all stages!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this! First time parents do we didn't know what we were doing. We thought we would never use the bassinet but it turned out that was the only thing our baby would sleep in! Music, swing, and vibration still working four months later! and we use this thing every night! it used to swing out baby to sleep and now she is in her cribe we just use the music every night as white noise! the bouncer we take everywhere! the toys are dull but I just hang some of her other ones on there!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lucchesi

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was fussy in her first few weeks, and this has been a lifesaver. The vibration helps settle her stomach, oddly enough (and helps her poop). The sounds are a bit odd and have very short loops, but do soothe her and help her fall asleep. Pay attention to the weight limits. Our baby is 2 months, and is tall for her age- but is about to size out of this already! We will store it in case we have another one- it really was a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Oddr3x

customer_reviews.title: The bouncer is bigger than expecting but I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for our 3rd baby that is due next month. I was able to put it together within about 20 mins with the help of a 2 yr old. The bouncer is bigger than expecting but I am happy with it, and the gliding motions look more soothing than that of a swing. The bassinet is very spacious and love the mesh sides. The print is pretty and very gender neutral which I love. I am hoping baby girl loves it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This swing has been a lifesaver! My newborn will not sleep in his bassinet. The first night I put him in the bassinet attachment, he slept no problem.I also love the bouncer attachment. I carry it around my house, and he loves being in it. I feel the price could be lower, but I would spend the money on one again.
customer_reviews.author: Dixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: ... you taking them out of the box but it's easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: +All the parts look intimidating when you taking them out of the box but it's easy to put together. + the soothing vibrations, music/outdoor noise and swing settings are great. + Great if you haven't set a nursery up yet and keep it at bedside
customer_reviews.author: Jess Burston

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bassinet Design
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet was my primary reason for buying this. The metal rods that support the bottom actually go between the bottom and the pad that your child lays on. The illistration in the instruction even shows this. Awful design.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the glider. I have been using it since she was born and it is a life saver! It rocks her to sleep and helps her stay asleep. It is quiet. I would recommend anyone to use this. We have it in the bedroom with us for the first few months until she grows out of it. Then we will transfer her to the crib in the nursery. We keep it on while she falls asleep and turn it off during sleep so she doesn’t get used to being rocked all the time when it is time to transition to the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: great gift or for yourself!!
customer_reviews.text: This swing has saved me many times when my 7 month old just doesn't want to sleep. He will fight sleepiness till I place him in this. Used the bassinet when he first came home and it was great! Helps mom be able to do what needs doing while having baby safe and happy close by. Its a good hight and the speeds are very varied . easy to assemble and to remove covers for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Yiset

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: We had some trouble putting some of it together, but once it's together, it's amazing! It switches from the bouncer to the bassinet with such ease. The sound for some of the music and white noise is definitely cheap sounding, and not my preferred noise when he's fussy. It's definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this, it had it all even the colors ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this , it had it all even the colors were nice but it wasn’t for me. I felt it was small for my child and she isn’t very big. The swing and bassinet was way to fast for me and it would go faster on its own and my child looked like it was almost out growing the chair and bassinet by the end of 1mt - I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Love this wish they could increase the capacity to 30 lbs for rocking
customer_reviews.text: My son used it until he weighed 15lbs and the rocking action no longer can be used for bassinet. He still uses the bouncer though which has 30lbs capacity. I think they should increase the capacity for bassinet rocking and should make it in some other dark color. Other than that i really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shalini Singhal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These swings are life savers. Our daughter loved it, so we bought a second when our son was born. Gave us peace of mind. I could go on. At 6 months he was to big and motor couldn't keep up, but these found a new home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good swing!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very good swing and isn't loud like the other swings which we LOVE! Love how easy it is to trade back and forth between the swing and bassinet all you do is lift one off and set the other on into the side grooves! Definitely would recommend this swing
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My littlest one loves this. I love the different rocking Speeds & how you can change from bassinet to seat. Pretty pricey and tbh the only reason I bought it was to replace one that I broke that didn’t belong to me :( I however would recommend if you’re looking for a bassinet
customer_reviews.author: Smart Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: If the baby could write, he would tell you that he loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Hard to please

customer_reviews.title: Life saver !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet, from day one til 7 weeks and going my baby sleeps in it and loves the swing and bouncer features . As a first time mom , this was such a good purchase ‘ and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking to make their baby sleep better throughout the night and take better naps during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen U.

customer_reviews.title: Update:  3.5 months and no longer moves now
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever, every parent needs this. Quiet, versatile, awesome!!! UPDATE: 3 1/2 Months and the glider no longer moves. Tried to find parts and nothing. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. McDanel

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought to keep at my house for my grandson while they visit. I love it and wish they had this when my kids were young. Very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent help for parents, all that you need to keep your baby happy and comfortable. Nap time, chilling time or night time this system is all you need. My granddaughter is a week old and she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Romero

customer_reviews.title: Loose bassinet liner
customer_reviews.text: The liner to the bassinet is loose and lumpy. It seems like it would pose a suffocation risk. I wouldn’t feel comfortable putting my newborn in the bassinet. I’ve contacted Graco and am waiting to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Olt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility of using either the bouncer or bassinet on the gliding system but HATE the fact that I couldn’t use separate sheets for the bassinet - made regular laundry difficult.
customer_reviews.author: The book lounge

customer_reviews.title: Love how this has a bassinet with it
customer_reviews.text: Love how this has a bassinet with it. It’s convenient to bring into the kitchen while cooking dinner, or in the laundry room while folding laundry. I haven’t used the swing yet but it seems to work the way it should. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. Daddy time multiplier. With this I am able to get things done while the baby is busy rocking, swinging and listening to the music. Would recommend to anyone that needs a bed side bed or napper.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marter

customer_reviews.title: Best item
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our new born baby. It is high quality and our baby loves it. I carry it around my house, and he loves being in it. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! Stops working
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY DOES NOT WORK LONGER THAN 2 MONTHS!! I’m so mad I wasted so much money on this. It literally just stops swinging randomly and my baby wakes up screaming. Any parent with a newborn knows how precious sleep is. On top of that when it did work the swing was noisy. And the music is so horrible I could never use it I would have to put music on my phone next to the swing. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves sitting in the bouncer up high. He enjoys being able to see everyone. He falls asleep in the bassinet when its rocking. I think he enjoys the freedom of laying down along with the movement. The swing looks nice, clean and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lias

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY way my baby sleeps. She is 2 months now and we still sleep her in this bassinet. I am so glad someone invented a rocking/gliding bassinet :)
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Helps so much!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Adorable , comfy,and baby loves it! Also if you put it in front of a glider chair you can rock it manually with your feet <3
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Nicole Milne

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to set up, well made, useful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Omg this was a life saver the first few weeks home with baby! For a period of time it was the only thing able to get her to sleep for nap times... only bad thing is I think our baby is becoming too heavy to really use it well- but hey if it helped for almost 3 full months I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: S.J.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't achieve what it says !!
customer_reviews.text: I get a replacement motor from Graco as promised but the 200$ product still doesn't work. With an infant at home and a product which just doesn't work you feel pathetic with the whole experience. It just doesn't prove the price and the features of this product
customer_reviews.author: Prakash K

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, buy this. My baby loves it and I'll definitely use this if we have another. I wish I would have had one from the start. I also got the 2 year insurance, but so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Kates

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought Oct 2017. It stopped working. Has a short in the control panel where you can select speed and sound. Our 11 month old just started sleeping through the night in it and now it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price for it being a 4 in 1 product. My grand daughter is going to love it. Wish I had this product when I was having a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Kinder

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: Not a colourful product but honestly baby's very limited vision makes this quite easy to add other colorful toys around the handle allowing your child to focus on that rather than the glider. In addition my daughter thoroughly enjoys the rocking-feature.
customer_reviews.author: Rogeolle Morris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing rocking bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Love love love! Feels safe for baby to sleep in on a flat surface unlike other swings. My baby loves it, has slept through the night since 2 weeks old! I wish I had had it with my first.
customer_reviews.author: Cat83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made for my baby. This thing is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: OregonGirl1991

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my expecting daughter - she loves it and feels baby will as well!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Do not work!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT DONT WORK! I was in the hospital for a while so I never got the time to send it back 😩 it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The swing is also great and he naps in it frequently
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bassinet my son will sleep in. The swing is also great and he naps in it frequently. My son is only a month old, so I'm not sure how long it will take him to outgrow the bassinet, but it's working great at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Baby isn't here yet, but this was easy to put together and is solid!
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even at level 1, the swing option is too much. My little guy cries every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lan Tran

customer_reviews.title: Only baby container you need!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! This has saved our sanity so many times! LO is almost 6 months but still uses it for naps it's so great! So low profile takes up minimal room but is very functional wish we got it before he was born!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Heppner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was a but difficult to put together, but I really like the self rocking bassinet option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful! Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! Don’t hesitate to buy. My first baby is now 3 yr and would wake all night but my newborn loves being glided gently all night. I stuff a doc a tot with incline wedge for my baby’s reflux and he sleeps very well. Love the other attachments. The base is not heavy but cumbersome to move room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gallo-Thys

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, use, and keep clean. Very fortunate to have this. Don't go spending more money unless you really need to.
customer_reviews.author: Mano Encanto

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got it!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about getting this because of the price, however I really love it. The baby loves the swing and she sleeps in the bassinet. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Weve used this every day since bringing my daughter home. The bassinet is a nice feature for having in the bedroom and our daughter lives the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina engman

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my newborn grand child. my daughter loves it. it's perfect for a new born baby. she picked it it looked so stable and all the features
customer_reviews.author: L. keatley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sound quit in the first month and swing stopped moving completely after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything you need in one box! Swing+bouncer+bassinet! This is a rare find... plus the material is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kashmendez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Glide function stopped working after less than 4 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Tadd

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby is 6 months old but it's scary to know that each day she is outgrowing this as she does not fall asleep anywhere else. I'm wondering what I would do without graco to soothe her to sleep in the coming days...
customer_reviews.author: stefi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the glider. It is a bit bulky though.
customer_reviews.author: Scutti's

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best swing, and the swinging bassinet is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bird is the word

customer_reviews.title: The GOAT bassinet (mama sleeps when baby sleeps)
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. We had no idea how much we’d love this when we ordered it. Our son sleeps peacefully in the bassinet portion and we’ve even taken on vacation with us. If you like your baby to sleep BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.author: MamaDee

customer_reviews.title: Had this open for the four months my daughter's been ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this open for the four months my daughter's been alive used maybe 5 times and already isn't working , need info on returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: relaxes baby ...allows Parents some freedom for awhile
customer_reviews.text: It really help to keep baby safe and occupied while I complete household chores
customer_reviews.author: Darnika B.

customer_reviews.title: Joy is ours!
customer_reviews.text: The quiet baby has replaced the evil twin screamer. Both the bassinet and chair work perfectly. A bit tedious to put together. Great music that won't drive you crazy. Spread the joy and spend a bit more for this path to peace.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Its soothing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. I got her to sleep in it the first night we got it. I would highly recommend this to other moms.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Watson

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Complete Junk. Used 10 times and the motor burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it on a great sale and assembled it in a little less than 45 minutes. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danius

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: The soothing system stopped working after 3 days of use. I tried contacting the manufacturer to see if it could be an easy fix, but I have not received a response. Now I have go out and quickly buy another bassinet for my newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Mimine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my baby girl I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lizmairin Clarke

customer_reviews.title: We have loved this thing
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this thing! It was a lifesaver with our newborn. He is now outgrowing it, and I don't know what we'll do. Love that it has the swing and we could remove the bouncer. It has a great handle, two vibration levels, and is easy to carry around the house to keep an eye on the little one without having to actually be carrying him. My only complaint is that there isn't a way to attach other toys to replace the bears that it comes with. It would have been nice for those spots to be loops to attach various other entertainment items.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea L.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My baby sleeps in the bassinet in our room every night! Level 3 is our favorite speed...not too fast or slow! It's perfect and doesn't take up a huge amount of space. Have not used the bouncer yet but you can't beat this giving you 3 options! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheaper brand swing thinking it would be okay. I was wrong. I then did some research and bought this swing and my child loves it and it's very simple to use and put together.
customer_reviews.author: William w.

customer_reviews.title: Eh, D batteries...
customer_reviews.text: Way too complicated and it was weak. Didn't like the battery design. Not sure who uses D cells any more but put in a rechargable LIon battery. Most things nowadays have it. Anyway it was just way too messy and when my son moved it stopped and slowed. He didn't like it so we sent it back. Needs a 21st century update.
customer_reviews.author: TheTotalConcept

customer_reviews.title: Great glider & recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Great glider & recommend this. Have had 3 children & should have bought this the first time. The swing you can use the AC adaptor & is battery free but the vibrator requires batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Would be really nice to have it but it glides with out a ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be really nice to have it but it glides with out a baby in it and if you put her in it will stop she was just born 3 days ago and is rely tiny!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: One good knock by my 1 year old and the seat ...
customer_reviews.text: Sending back. I have a 1 year old and a newborn on the way. My idea was to have the newborn in the swing and be able to remove the seat and carry the newborn to the bathroom or another room so they aren't left together unattended. The seat sits way too loosely and is a pain to out in and out. One good knock by my 1 year old and the seat will fall off the base. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Over all good product but after a week
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are very confusing. Over all good product but after a week, one of the leg was lose. So I no more find it safe for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Asi

customer_reviews.title: but the bouncer/swing is great. I do wish the harness was softer
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver. for days when getting the baby down for a nap seems impossible. The bassinet is okay, but the bouncer/swing is great. I do wish the harness was softer. The straps can't be used unless the baby is wearing something (which in the summer is a hassle because it is so hot). We almost sent this back because she hated that the bassinet moved, but the swing lulls her to sleep in a few minutes (even on the fussiest days)..
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Kid out grew the bassinet by 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Kid out grew the bassinet by 4 months old. He can still fit but kicks and moves too much so won't sleep in it anymore. We still use the swing but not very much. For how much use it's seen, it wasn't worth the price for us but not because of anything Graco did wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chauvot

product_meta.title: Graco Soothing System Gliding Baby Swing, Abbington
product_meta.description:
Graco's Soothing System Glider, in Abbington, has four modes, including a gliding swing, gliding bassinet, portable bouncer, and portable bassinet. In glider mode, it soothes with the same gentle motion used when cuddling and comforting baby in your nursery glider. Use the portable bassinet to keep baby close to you anywhere in the home or the portable bouncer to entertain your little one in any room. The plush, roomy seat with removable infant supports and vibration will keep baby cozy, while music will keep baby entertained. With the Graco Soothing System Glider, you have four modes of use with the gliding motion baby loves. Care and Maintenance : FROM TIME TO TIME CHECK YOUR SWING for loose screws, worn parts, torn material or stitching. Replace or repair the parts as needed. Use only Graco replacement parts. TO CLEAN SEAT COVER: refer to your care tag on your seat pad for washing instructions. NO BLEACH , TO CLEAN FRAME: use only household soap and warm water. NO BLEACH OR DETERGENT , EXCESSIVE EXPOSURE TO SUN OR HEAT could cause fading or warping of parts.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Graco’s Soothing System Glider, in Abbington, soothes with the same gentle motion you use when cuddling and comforting baby in your nursery glider
A gliding swing, gliding bassinet, portable bouncer and portable bassinet in one, for the ultimate soothing solution for your little one
Bouncer’s convenient carry-handle makes it easy to transition from swing to bouncer and keep baby by your side
Vibration with two speed settings keeps baby relaxed. Plug in to save up to $130* annually, or use batteries for convenience; Bassinet Weight Limit: Infants from 5.5 to 15 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars255 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
